body_html:
The estimator = model.get_estimator() feature is now available for tf.keras (in TF 1.4).

To train a Keras model from TFRecords, please see this example: https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/examples/mnist_tfrecord.py
body_text:
The estimator = model.get_estimator() feature is now available for tf.keras (in TF 1.4).
To train a Keras model from TFRecords, please see this example: https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/examples/mnist_tfrecord.py
body:
The `estimator = model.get_estimator()` feature is now available for `tf.keras` (in TF 1.4).

To train a Keras model from TFRecords, please see this example: https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/examples/mnist_tfrecord.py
